Articles.Content: I know how to take screenshots, where, to find them, and how to attach them to a post, but how do I put them inside a post? Please help.

F1 will take a screenshot and place it in the Screenshots folder.

Upload that to an image hosting site such as imgur.com and use the BBCode link it gives you to paste into your post.

Also, please select the code you post and put spoiler tags around it (the nuke toolbar button) to help keep the forums compact and tidy. Thanks!

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
imageshack.us is another good website that lets you put pictures directly on the post

imageshack.us is also not visible in all countries. Bad option IMHO.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
I use dropbox. It\'s somewhat private, but it\'s had it\'s amusement with hackers. Still, I haven\'t had any trouble so far.

Dropbox has a bandwidth limit and as some users here are finding out, KSP\'s popularity can cause your account to exceed that limit making it so no one can see your images. It\'s great for small to medium group sharing, but using a link publicly can get it shutdown quick if the popularity is high enough.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
